420240.name: Monster RPG 1
420240.description:
The original Monster RPG game. This game was originally released for free in 2007. It's a turn-based JRPG like the sequels. For the sake of completing the series, and due to request, it has been released as free DLC here on Steam. Playing this game is not required to play Monster RPG 2 or Monster RPG 3 (the stories are not connected.)

The story sees Coro searching for his son Eny who has gone missing. You must battle your way through the mountains to uncover clues. Monsters are afoot, so it won't be easy.
